name: Kiran Punwatkar
aboutMeHeadline: I'm Kiran Punwatkar, Android & Flutter developer, LinkedIn Top Voice.
aboueMeDetails:
I am highly skilled Software Engineer with 8 years of experience. Proven expertise in Medical, Healthcare and Banking mobile domain
mobile applications. Proficient development skills with Kotlin, Java, Android SDK, JSON, GCM/FCM, Material Design, Retrofit, Room, Firebase. Demonstrated success in creating scalable systems using large language models (LLMs) and delivered products that exceed
expectations using MVP, MVVM and MVI architecture pattern. Experienced in Dagger & Koin dependency injection. Hands on experience
with Google maps, Geo location & google analytics.
